title: Errors on jupyter
body_html:
I install pytorch 0.2 through pip, when I try to import torch from ipython notebook, I got following errors:

*** Error in `/usr/bin/python3': free(): invalid pointer: 0x00007fc8c40ffb80 ***
======= Backtrace: =========
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(+0x777e5)[0x7fc8f37d77e5]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(+0x7fe0a)[0x7fc8f37dfe0a]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(cfree+0x4c)[0x7fc8f37e398c]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so(_ZNSt6locale5_Impl16_M_install_facetEPKNS_2idEPKNS_5facetE+0x142)[0x7fc8c3e99802]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so(_ZNSt6locale5_ImplC2Em+0x1e3)[0x7fc8c3e9b953]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so(_ZNSt6locale18_S_initialize_onceEv+0x15)[0x7fc8c3e9c8c5]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0(+0xea99)[0x7fc8f3b37a99]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so(_ZNSt6locale13_S_initializeEv+0x21)[0x7fc8c3e9c911]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so(_ZNSt6localeC1Ev+0x13)[0x7fc8c3e9c953]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so(_ZNSt8ios_base4InitC1Ev+0xb4)[0x7fc8c3e6e1b4]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libcusparse-94011b8d.so.8.0.61(+0x2f85b4)[0x7fc89455e5b4]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libcusparse-94011b8d.so.8.0.61(+0x2f8703)[0x7fc89455e703]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libcusparse-94011b8d.so.8.0.61(+0x393cc6)[0x7fc8945f9cc6]

Not sure how this happened. I build this docker from https://github.com/lynic/notebooks/blob/master/ml/Dockerfile
In 0.1.12 it works fine.

body:
I install pytorch 0.2 through pip, when I try to import torch from ipython notebook, I got following errors:
```
*** Error in `/usr/bin/python3': free(): invalid pointer: 0x00007fc8c40ffb80 ***
======= Backtrace: =========
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(+0x777e5)[0x7fc8f37d77e5]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(+0x7fe0a)[0x7fc8f37dfe0a]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(cfree+0x4c)[0x7fc8f37e398c]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so(_ZNSt6locale5_Impl16_M_install_facetEPKNS_2idEPKNS_5facetE+0x142)[0x7fc8c3e99802]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so(_ZNSt6locale5_ImplC2Em+0x1e3)[0x7fc8c3e9b953]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so(_ZNSt6locale18_S_initialize_onceEv+0x15)[0x7fc8c3e9c8c5]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0(+0xea99)[0x7fc8f3b37a99]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so(_ZNSt6locale13_S_initializeEv+0x21)[0x7fc8c3e9c911]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so(_ZNSt6localeC1Ev+0x13)[0x7fc8c3e9c953]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so(_ZNSt8ios_base4InitC1Ev+0xb4)[0x7fc8c3e6e1b4]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libcusparse-94011b8d.so.8.0.61(+0x2f85b4)[0x7fc89455e5b4]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libcusparse-94011b8d.so.8.0.61(+0x2f8703)[0x7fc89455e703]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/torch/lib/libcusparse-94011b8d.so.8.0.61(+0x393cc6)[0x7fc8945f9cc6]

```

Not sure how this happened. I build this docker from https://github.com/lynic/notebooks/blob/master/ml/Dockerfile
In 0.1.12 it works fine.
